titlestmt.titleproper: James Atkins letters to Ralph Nelson, 1889
titlestmt.author: David Hill

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by David Hill using EADitor ©2011

change.item: Imported into EADitor. Some normalization has occurred to apply EAD 2002 schema validation and conform to EADitor basic requirements.

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.unittitle: James Atkins letters to Ralph Nelson
did.abstract: Six letters from James Atkins to Ralph Nelson concerning the exchange of information on British colonial coins and efforts to obtain coins for each other.

daodesc.p: Part of a page from a November 14, 1889, letter

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: James Atkins of East Street, Bromley, England, was the author of The Coins and Tokens of the Possessions and Colonies of the British Empire (1889) and coauthor of The Coins and Tokens of the Possessions and Colonies of the British Empire (1888).

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: James Atkins letters to Ralph Nelson, 1889, Archives, American Numismatic Society.

userestrict.head: Restrictions
userestrict.p: Copyright restrictions may apply. Permission to publish or reproduce must be secured from the American Numismatic Society.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Six letters (January-November 1989) from James Atkins to Ralph Nelson of North Bondgate, Bishop Auckland, England, concerning the exchange of information on British colonial coins and tokens and efforts to obtain coins for each other.
